answers.answer: Hello,This could be something called postural hypotension.  Does it happen when you move suddenly or stand up suddenly?If your drs have ruled out anything serious, then this is great news.  I would recommend that you record when this happens to see if there is any pattern?Ie. you haven't eaten for a long time, you move suddenly, etc.  If you can see a pattern, then this may help you see why this happens and what you can do about it.You need to reassure yourself so that this feeling doesn't turn into a panic attack.  Stress can really do strange things to us....

question: I get these light headed feelings and then turns into a panic attack cause it scares me cause I don't know what's going on and I've went to the doctors and they checked my blood pressure checked my sugars checked if I had diabetes and everything came back normal can someone tell me what's going on with me please and thank you
title: light headed
